frozen.name: rider
frozen.shortDescription: A cross-platform .NET IDE based on the IntelliJ platform and ReSharper
frozen.longDescription:
JetBrains Rider is a new .NET IDE based on the IntelliJ
platform and ReSharper. Rider supports .NET Core,
.NET Framework and Mono based projects. This lets you
develop a wide array of applications including .NET desktop
apps, services and libraries, Unity games, ASP.NET and
ASP.NET Core web applications.
